samples.context: Professor Ahmad explains about Red Data Book to the children. He tells them that Red Data Book is the source book which keeps a record of all the endangered animals and plants.
samples.question: What does the Red Data Book record?

samples.context: Red Data Book is maintained internationally by an organisation. India also maintains Red Data Book for plants and animals found in India.
samples.question: Who maintains the Red Data Book in India?

samples.context: Red Data Book is the source book which keeps a record of all the endangered animals and plants. Red Data Book is maintained internationally by an organisation.
samples.question: What is the purpose of the Red Data Book?

samples.context: India also maintains Red Data Book for plants and animals found in India. Professor Ahmad explains about Red Data Book to the children.
samples.question: Which country has its own Red Data Book?
